item.title: TOPdesk TOPdesk On-Premises Classic
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link source vendor-statements/TOPdesk.png Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL CVE-2021-44228: Not vuln NCSC-NL Although the standard product is not vulnerable, we advise our customers to scan for vulnerabilies if they modified the product, installed add-ons or bespoke work Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-20 12:37:57 NCSC-NL Updated community note.
